content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with Farhad Abbasi from Iran.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the negotiation of the rental price for my apartment in Magdeburg.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If no, why did you not agree on a final price?
name: Evaluator

content:
[Answer]
I did not agree on a final price because the potential tenant was offering a price that I felt was too low for the value of the apartment. I was looking for a higher price.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content:
[Answer]
I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner as 9. There were no issues with the interaction and the negotiation was conducted professionally and respectfully.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If no, why did you not feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content:
[Answer]
I did not feel discriminated or offended because the negotiation was conducted in a respectful and professional manner. The potential tenant and I both expressed our views and counteroffers, but there was no hostility or disrespect in the conversation.
name: Peter Schmidt
